Summary: This is a GREAT property for families of a few nights for business.  The room is large and so is the bathroom.  There is a small and useful gym and pool with a hot tub.  Not only is the room spacious and comfortable but it was relatively quiet and the breakfast is freshly made.  Unlikely most accommodations in this price range the breakfast is not pre-made and warmed.  I would stay here again.

My overnight stay was wonderful. Staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Room is large as is the tub.  The sink is separated from the room with the toilet and tub which I always prefer.  Bed and bedding very comfortable.  The breakfast was fresh and complete with scrambled eggs and sausage.  Ample parking and free. Two deficits I will mention.  Although the picture shows a roaring fireplace - the fireplace was never roaring when we were there. It was a cold weekend and a crackling roaring fire in the lobby would have been nice. The desk staff said they’ve never seen it on. Also I don’t understand why the Ayres actually charges a breakage fee, then reimburses. Why don’t they just post the charge then delete it like other hotels?  All things considered, staying at an Ayres is

The service was very professional. Eleanor was great in scheduling the room, and after I arrived, she was at the desk, and checked me into the room. I love doing business with the Ayres Suites Yorba Linda. Great value and comfort.

I was looking for a hotel that would be comfortable, clean and safe with a good proximity to Disneyland and a wedding we went to in Aliso Viejo. Ayres hotel met all of those needs and went above and beyond! The room was beautiful, the bed was comfortable, the restroom was really nice with a large oval bathtub, everything was really nice. The front office and staff were so kind and accommodated any request we had. We are two young girls and of course watched our surroundings, but we felt very safe throughout the hotel and parking lot. This is the best choice we could’ve possibly picked. I highly recommend it!

Nice location just off the 91 near food.  Felt new & Clean. Comfy bed!! Nice couch that was NOT fabric so felt cleaner & easy to wipe down yourself if you feel the need.  Roomy bath/shower with handy shelves!!  Vanity is outside the toilet/shower.  The kitchenette area is very nice & convenient. Sadly, the fridge was barely cool so I couldn't put any food in it, but that is often the case in any hotel with them which is frustrating.  But that's the only negative.  Everything else was great.  Would stay again.

Summary Heading: Keep up the good work Ayers!
Summary: I stayed at the Ayers Hotel with my wife and 2 children for a circuit assembly in Norco. The staff was nice and we chatted about the traffic. The breakfast in the morning was hot and delicious. The room was clean. The bathroom had a tub that was larger than we anticipated. The staff even gave us a 20% off coupon for the restaurant next door. I will definitely recommend Ayers to friends and family.

Excellent staff, very clean and modern with large rooms and a good breakfast.  Also, close to Enterprise car rental and  many restaurants.  Pool area well maintained.  Overall, it was a great place to stay.

Summary Heading: First time staying at an Ayres
Summary: This is our first time staying at Ayres Suites. We loved this hotel! The king bed was.wider than usual. The bath towels felt softer and fluffier than most hotels do. The room was clean, the staff was friendly, and the site was quiet. Close to restaurants and shopping. There is a beautiful regional park about a mile away. We have nothing negative to report. Will definitely be back.

Summary Heading: Nice place, but didn't respect our privacy
Summary: We appreciated the large, well lit king studio suite with three comfortable chairs, sofa, desk, small table, mini-fridge (no freezer), and microwave.  The well lit sink area was separate from the shower/toilet room, but the counter space was a bit cramped.  The bed was comfortable.  The shower head was powerful--definitely a water waster.  Breakfast was very good, with non-processed scrambled eggs and cheese, sausage, and French toast or potatoes, depending on the day.  Our room overlooked the 91 freeway.  We could hear a constant dull roar, but it didn't keep us awake.  We ate dinner at the good El Torito next door. The problem we had was that the "Do Not Disturb" sign that we put on our door was ignored; someone came in anyway and did some cleaning.  We complained at the front

This hotel is neat, clean, up to date, and two steps above the usual mid-range offering.  The front desk attendant was outstanding. The location is good - easy off the highway and restaurants in easy walking distance. I would definitely stay here again.

Stay was fine but....hotel placed a $100 hold on my cc in addition to room fee.  I called and emailed to have the fee removed-and there was no response to my email, and the clerk told me it would be removed; it wasn't.  Had to file a dispute with my cc company.

There are not a lot of hotels to choose from in Yorba Linda & Ayres is a reliable brand. The hotel parking was free & plentiful. The breakfast offerings were well above average, tasty & fresh. There was no lobby coffee except during breakfast hours which were limited, which I found surprising/disappointing. The room was spacious & clean and the water pressure in the shower was excellent. Freeway noise from the 91 was definitely noticeable all night, I suppose because my room was facing the freeway, maybe request a quieter room.

Found bogus charges on my bill prior to checking out spoke with management and they were not going to remove them.  I had to dispute the charge with my credit card company. In the future we will be staying at the Marriott.  Saw other reviews from people that had similar experience

Ayers has put much thought and planning into ADA rooms. Ours was located closest to the lobby and breakfast room. Entry door was automatic. The large room had 2 comfortable beds. It’s amazing to me how few hotels have ADA rooms with 2 beds. The bathroom was well equipped with a roll in shower and grab bars. Along with these special features the hotel is attractive and clean with ample free parking, and a delicious included breakfast is available. This is definitely our favorite hotel for our special needs. Other hotel chains should take a lesson from Ayers.

Great stay overall! There were restaurants nearby and so was convenient. Breakfast and WiFi could be better. WiFi was really spotty. Would recommend overall if breakfast and WiFi aren't important during a stay.

Everything was great, nice room, good breakfast, friendly staff.  Location close to freeway, a lot of restaurants and grocery store  I am Not a fan of down pillows, had to use couch throw pillows instead

Love this Hotel. Have stayed here many times, rooms are spacious, and clean. Breakfast is way better than most comped breakfasts, they cook to order if you like and also have a nice selection of healthy items. Staff is very accommodating and friendly!

Loved this hotel! This was close to all the places that I needed to go to and be at. Breakfast was pretty good. But would like to suggest to have non-dairy milk options for people like me who is allergic to dairy or lactose intolerant. The King bed room that was given to me was a very nice size suite. I requested a room at the end of the hallway away from noise and Sabrina from the front desk granted my request. Staff was friendly. The room was clean and bed was comfortable to sleep on. The price I paid was reasonably priced considering it was a day after Thanksgiving. It was nice that they did not charge extra fees for parking or "resort fees". Probably the only negative thing I will say is that when I called the front desk at an earlier time upon my arrival at the airport that

Summary Heading: Wouldn't stay anywhere else in Orange County!
Summary: Due to my job requirements, I stay at Ayres Suites nearly every week from Monday through Thursday. From my first stay, I was blown away by how far above other hotels they were. The check in is quick; the rooms are spacious, well-styled, well-appointed, and clean. The bed is actually more comfortable than mine at home! The complimentary breakfast is much more complete than other places. The hotel, overall, is beautiful. And the staff is hard-working and upbeat. Last time I stayed, I realized I had lost a diamond ring (given to me when my grandma died), and I was beside myself. I called every place I had gone all day. Then at 5PM, I got a call from the manager saying my ring had been located.  I really can't say enough about the quality of Ayres Suites Yorba Linda. I don't know if

The only thing I can say I give a one star about the hotel is it's complimentary breakfast. Not anything to write home about. I have traveled to Europe and stayed in 2 and 3 star hotels it's the same type of basic scramble eggs. Fried Potatoes with some veggies (okay) and bacon or sausage and pancakes.. Dollar tree type pastries.. It's all just enough to start your off before sightseeing. That's it. But the rooms and staff 5 stars 100% I will definitely tell everyone I know to stay here. Except for the breakfast you get more than what you paid for.

Clean and comfortable.  Excellent breakfast options. Very convenient location in Yorba Linda. 4th floor is the best, no kids running above you! Staff was also extreme nice. Hood workout room too. Will stay again!

on the whole everything was good. We only wish that there were vending machines with water or soda. Staff were very professional. Room was  nice and clean . So was the bedding. Clean white linen is very important .

This hotel is a must stay!! The hotel was beautiful, clean, and welcoming for my toddler and I! You walk into the lobby and are greeted with beautiful fireplace and inviting sofa. The staff are extremely polite and take the time to know you! The room was spacious with a microwave, wet bar, good size mini fridge, a small dinning table, a work desk and ergonomic chair, and a living room! All of the appliances were immaculate! The  carpet might need a wash but no smell or stains! My son loved the pull out sofa! To my shock when taking out the sofa cushions I was pleased to see how clean it was! Usually there's crumbs or old food under cushions but no just clean and decent size pull out bed! The complimentary breakfast was delicious and hot! But for mom's favorite part, the

The experience is awesome (quiet, clean, good toiletries, and good breakfast). The staffs at the front desk are very professional and helped us for all we need. I have my ESA dog and they made the accommodation right away.

We thoroughly enjoyed a four-day stay and were impressed by the very roomy room! Everything was spotlessly clean and most comfortable. . . and quiet, too! The breakfast room was a joy with the delicious variety of food available.

We stayed at Ayres Suites Yorba Linda for my Husbands 50th High School Reunion.  Close to restaurants if you don’t make in time for the free breakfast.  The room was clean and spacious.  I would highly recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: Two week stay to visit family.
Summary: We found the hotel accommodations wonderful. The staff was friendly, courteous and professional. From the front desk to the cleaning staff we were always greeted with a smile. The breakfast is a step above the typical hotel and our room was clean and spacious. It’s convenient to have a Mexican restaurant next door plus many other restaurants and shopping close by. There’s also a beautiful local park nearby with walking trails, streams, and a lake. We would highly recommend this hotel.

We stayed at Ayres Suites Yorba Linda for a wedding. The hotel lobby itself was even more beautiful than what the pictures showed. The bar and breakfast area were spacious and clean. The pool area was great and made our stay even better! The room itself was spacious and very nice. The service was great. I have no complaints about this hotel, and would absolutely stay there again.

Summary Heading: Stayed at Ayres while our home was being painted.
Summary: The hotel was clean and well maintained.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The breakfast was very nice and the breakfast area was clean and neat. Food tasted good and was nice and hot. There was a nice selection of breakfast beverages both hot and cold.

Our stay at Ayres Yorba Linda for our wedding was amazing!!  We arranged our hotel block with Lisa.  She responded to my inquiry regarding a block within 24 hours and made it super easy to set up a block.  She kept me informed of how many spaces were left in the block & allowed me to add more rooms to the block when the spaces were running low close to the room reservation deadline.  The service at the hotel was awesome!!  We were greeted by Elenor, and she made our stay outstanding!!- just sooo friendly & answered all our questions.   The accommodations were nice.  The rooms were clean and spacious.  The fitness room was clean and spacious as well… plenty of cardio equipment.  The complimentary breakfast was delicious!!  Other food is nearby - within walking distance.  There

This is the third time we’ve stayed at Ayres in YL in the last two years. Each stay was four or five nights. Every time it was an enjoyable one. The rooms are spacious, well kept and clean. The breakfast is good and offers a nice variety. The pool and spa are well maintained and clean. I use and appreciate the four complimentary electric vehicle chargers. We’ll stay there again when next we return to YL.

Ayres Suites Yorba Linda was the perfect place to stay and have all of our out of town guest stay for our sons wedding. The rooms were all beautiful and clean. We had every room type within our group accessible to Suite, all were nice.  Our guest enjoyed the public spaces to meet up, they enjoyed swimming and the nice breakfast provided.  The staff was always caring and helpful to our needs. They were always there for our questions from setting up the group stay to the end. I highly suggest Ayres Suites Yorba Linda for a family stay.

Excellent facility with courteous and gracious staff. Breakfast amenities one of the nicest I have experienced. Room spacious/updated looks and very clean. Location convenient for my trip. Lots of eating places nearby too.

I can always rely  on the Ayres to provide a great stay. We stayed for several nights. The  king suite was nice with a sofa bed, fridge and microwave. Had to request bedding for the sofa bed and they brought two fitted sheets- wasn’t a problem, I used for extra padding. Breakfast was standard. Waffles were very good!! They also had a bar and a happy hour. This Ayres is in walking distance from a good Mexican restaurant and two major fast food chains. Only issue was a slight smell from the room sink - needed bleach or something to deodorize the pipes- not an issue for the room though.  Good reward program. Easy to earn free stay. It’s my preferred hotel for So Cal.

How nice this hotel is!  Cleanest rooms ever. Homey relaxing lobby. Very comfortable beds. Lots of cable tv channels too.  Teakfast served daily. Can also enjoy adult beverages at the bar. We highly recommend this hotel.  Staff is awesome too. We will be back soon. !

Summary Heading: Ayres Suites Yorba Linda, California The CLEANEST and most LOVEABLE place EVER!
Summary: I felt like I had walked into an Executive hotel. They welcomed me with love.  My suite was excellent. The large oval bathtub sealed the deal. At the front desk were about 15 or more awards. They said housekeeping won all of them for their hotel.

We stayed one night only, but everything was pretty easy since the reservation. Front desks are super nice, place super clean and organized. Our room had everything that we needed and bkf was good too..

Old, not well maintained. there was no drinking water available. no vending machines. overall experience was bad. the rooms smelled bad. Had to come down to the reception to collect the towels. short staffed

Summary Heading: Other Than TV Channels Everything Was Great
Summary: I really liked the hotel, the location, my room, the bed, the bathroom, everything. Except hardly any of the TV channels listed on the channel guide in the room, under the TV remote control worked -- most said "no signal." Also, many that did "work" were extremely poor quality -- pixelated, etc. I was only trying to see what was on, so I didn't really care, but they should update the channel guide in the room and/or fix the TV issue. The breakfast was fine.

Summary Heading: Enjoyed our stay with Ayres! We always try to stay with them.
Summary: Love this hotel!  Very upscale! First class all the way!  Yorba Linda is our home town so feeling comfortable at Ayres means a lot. Breakfast is great and the staff are friendly. Rooms are nice and large. Bathroom tub is very nice. Couldn’t ask for more!

I did the cross-country road trip...from the Carolinas to California! Along the way, I spent a couple nights at the Ayres Suites in Yorba Linda. The room was spacious and I had a little kitchenette. I got such a good night's sleep there as well.  While they had construction going on, it still was a delightful stay. The staff was so hospitable and doted on my dog. That's the way to any pet owner's heart, lol!  I would definitely stay here again and I'm figuring out my route for another California adventure later this year right now. I hope it brings me back to Yorba Linda!

From arrival to departure for a weekend to a wedding for the weekend the experience was great.  Rooms very clean, comfortable and the staff was very accommodating to our needs. Would definitely stay again .

Summary Heading: Everything to enjoy and be warmed by, with hospitality
Summary: we arrived late to the hotel and it was so welcoming, well appointed, comfortable and delightful amenities. Beautiful rooms, designer-comfort beds, well-equipped bathrooms , along with ironing board & iron.Blow dryer, and soft towels. Front desk people were very accommodating with information & help. We're anxious to visit again.

Summary Heading: Trip to the drags & Nixon Library
Summary: Would definitely stay there again!  Rooms were clean and well appointed with a fridge, coffee maker, and microwave.  The staff was very helpful and friendly. Breakfast was great. It was in a nice area, close to restaurants and activities.

This place was immaculately clean, well decorated, and sleeping here was comfortable and quiet. I highly recommend this location. This is one of the cleanest hotels I have stayed. I was so impressed with my room. Everything was spotless.

The hotel and room wear very clean.  Upon arrival the a/c unit wasn't cooling well and, after reporting it to the front desk, we returned to the room and it was working great. The outdoor area had lots of seating which seems to be harder and harder to come by at many other hotels.

Summary Heading: The cleanliness of a room immaculate. Room fixtures quality. Great roommate and service.
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel a few times now. This time I was determined to find something in the room that was not perfectly clean. I couldn't. The rooms are immaculate. Not a Dust Bunny anywhere. Nothing out of sorts and everything working with good quality furniture in good condition. The rest of the hotel property is as well maintained. Checking is quick and the people working there are friendly. The hotel is situated in a good area with lots of shopping options and restaurants. What else can I say? It is a perfect night stay.

Stephanie the manager is a horrible manager. Unhelpful, rude, and frankly completely unqualified to be the manager here. Every other employee was nice, but unfortunately the head manager is a dolt. Shame.
Manager Response: Dear Tony M,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay. Although we wished you had an exceptional experience, we are always open to hearing feedback on ways in which we can improve. We are disappointed to see that you did not have a stellar visit, but as mentioned during your time at our hotel, our policy requires that the credit card holder be present for us to process any payments. Your insight is appreciated and we wish you the best in all of your future travels.  Sincerely, Stephanie Rench  General Manager

Summary: This is the second time we've stayed there within a year.  This time over the new-year's holiday.  All-around good everything.  Nice staff, clean, cozy, good breakfast, following Covid protocols well.  We'll stay there again next time we're in the area.

Excellent experience. Beautiful hotel alway clean and friendly atmosphere. We alway stay here when visiting Yorba Linda. Close to many restaurants and Costco is just around the corner for cheap gas and last minute goodies.

My wife and I really enjoyed our 12 day stay. The rooms had nice drapery along with traditional style furniture. The entrance was decorated for the holidays and that was TRULY appreciated. The separate one bedroom suite was very comfortable with a large oversized chair. I was hospitalized for 4 days and knew that my wife would be safe and close to shops and friends. The king sized bed and pillows were very comfortable. Some suggestions would be adding another oversized chair in the main bedroom for a spouse or second person and installation of a real full size under counter refrigerator. The tiny "refrigerator only" provided is simply to small. The oversized tub was really very nice for our showers but feel a safety grab bar should be installed for ease of ingress and egress. We

We have family members who recently moved near our favorite Orange County hotel, so it was a natural progression to book our accommodations at the Ayres Suites in Yorba Linda. The ALWAYS friendly staff greeted us on arrival and had us off to our room within a minute. The room was great, as always, the breakfast very satisfying, and the holiday decorations were charming.  We even used the workout room, which we had never done before. We were so happy we could visit our family, yet not burden them with having to find space to put us up, and we had a very comfortable place to go to that we have enjoyed for years. We appreciate that your operation has remained friendly and homey despite all of the recent challenges. As the British would say, “Proper job!”

Summary Heading: Very Nice, even with a power outage
Summary: Very clean, quit and comfortable. Windy all day and power finally went out. Hotel staff made sure everything was ok and were right there to assist in getting us in and out.  Signs went up immediately to show exits and stairs......good work keeping people safe. Power was back on in a few hours.  The free breakfast, is excellent.  Fresh eggs, bacon, coffee with a cook right there to help you. 5 Stars for the breakfast. Staff is friendly and gracious.

Friendly and gracious staff. Quiet and comfortable rooms. Safe and close to shopping and restaurants.   I always enjoy my stay here.  The rooms are always clean. The staff is amazing. Being remembered makes it more special.   Breakfast and the nightly bar make the start complete.

I had the opportunity to stay 1 month on this Hotel and it was incredible. Good service of the employees and the good breakfast every morning!. The installations are new, and very clean room. Totally recommendable.

Summary Heading: Very Nice Hotel with a bad mattress.
Summary: Very nice hotel.....except the mattress. It was horrible for both of us. Stayed there in July in a different room and it was very comfortable. This time not so much. In fact when we sat on the edge to get in it made noises like it was breaking down further.

I had a great experience at Ayres Suites. My flight was delayed a whole day and I was worried I would still be charged for not using the room, thankfully I wasn't! I even called when my flight landed and asked if I would be able to do an early check-in. I was called back in less than an hour and was told a room was available. Every staff member I encountered here was pleasant: front desk, housekeeping and the breakfast staff. Everyone was great, the room was a lot bigger in person, the breakfast was tasty, the bed and sofa bed was comfortable, literally everything went well during my stay. My mom who has been in housekeeping for more than 30 years was even surprised that the "out of eye sight" spots were clean. I will definitely be booking here again. Thank you!

Wonderful experience from start to finish.  There are thousands of places to eat nearby. The room was very clean /with a microwave and refrigerator and a super large tub. The staff was super nice and the breakfast can't say enough about-fresh tasty food--Thank you

If there’s an Ayres, that’s where I’ll be staying! From check in to check out, it’s always a great experience. Beautiful hotel with clean rooms, comfy bed, and a big, soak worthy tub! Great pool area, with  a nice hot breakfast included. The staff is always happy to help. It’s a hotel you can count on!

My family and I stayed at this hotel for a family wedding. There were probably 25 of us at this hotel. We all agreed that the rooms were great. The bathroom offered a large shower and a separate vanity with granite countertops. I stayed in the average sized room which offered a large king size bed separate sitting area with couch etc. Many of us brought our dogs. Very accommodating for our dogs. Some of our kids had the bridal suites to get ready for the wedding. The suites were absolutely great. The customer service was excellent at the front desk. The hotel staff were all so nice and helpful. And the complimentary breakfast in the morning was very much appreciated, after having danced the night away the night before! I highly recommend the Ayres hotel!

I had never heard of Ayres before, but luckily it was mentioned in a negative review from another hotel chain. I decided to check it out and I’m very happy I did. The hotel was very nice. It is Very clean and quiet and the daily breakfast was exceptional. The room was very clean and the staff was courteous and helpful. Now that I have family in Yorba Linda this will be my go-to place. Lots of shopping and restaurants near by, many of them walkable. Will definitely return for another stay.

Repeat guest here and the place still looks brand new.  Very large rooms with everything one would  need.   Staff was very friendly and made me feel welcome.   Breakfast room was open and serving real food, not the bagged breakfast to go.

We stayed at this hotel for a family wedding, with people coming from all over the US. The staff went out of their way to insure our stay was a good one. Clean, friendly, and accommodating.  Will be back next trip for sure!

Lovely hotel, convenient to Yorba Linda and Nixon Presidential Library.  Tasteful decor throughout.  Room was spacious and well appointed.  Complementary breakfast best I've had in a hotel.  Go for the scrambled eggs!

Great location. Clean room. Staff was helpful and friendly. Breakfast didn't have a ton of selection but was sufficient and good quality.  We were very happy with our stay and would stay here again in the future.

Easy check in/out. Room seemed pretty quiet despite some construction in the are. Parking is pretty small but we were allowed to park in the restaurant parking lot right next door. Convenient restaurants nearby. The breakfast buffet had a nice mix of hot waffles, pancakes, scrambled egg and cold food like yogurt, cottage cheese and mixed fruit. Did not seem to have any milk for the oatmeal and no fresh fruit. Would be helpful to have trays nearby to be able to carry the juice, coffee and meal. Had to make a few trips to carry everything. I will definitely being staying there again when I'm in the area.

My mom & I stayed at the Ayres hotel in their ADA room as she is in a wheel chair most of the time.    We needed to stay because my dad was taken to a nursing home after an unexpected trip to the ER & short stay at the hospital.     We stayed from Aug 31-Sept 14th.    The room was very comfortable  and had roll in shower.      Breakfast every day was delicious and made fresh by a cook every day.  The staff were very supportive and encouraging for Mom & I during this tough time.  We also had our small dog.  Sofie enjoyed the stay too!  They also had a bar that you could purchase drinks from during the week.

Summary Heading: Our stay here was great.  In fact it was Perfect!   I’m happy to share my experience with future guests.
Summary: Spotless & clean, comfortable room, bed, shower, we’re all exceptional.  Overall, the property was perfect for our needs.   All amenities provided exceeded our expectations.  Highly recommend.   Everything about this property was exceptional.

We stayed here for 6 nights and were very pleased with the experience. We were a bit leery as the price was comparable to lower-quality properties. We needn't have worried. The hotel delivered a great stay. The rooms were clean and spacious. The room amenities were great. Although the breakfast was scaled back due to the current Covid situation - it was varied and hot. Housekeeping was also scaled back to Covid, but housekeeping was very responsive to a request for a refresh. We most definitely will stay here again!

Summary Heading: Business trip. Staff very professional, and accommodation excellent. Good value.
Summary: Ayers provides a great lodging experience, at very affordable prices. The staff was very accommodating, and the breakfast options were excellent. I had not stayed at the Yorba Linda-Ayres since the COVID-19. I am glad the Ayers family has continued with their excellent lodging experience at a reasonable price.

This hotel does not give you water in your room! Really?? During COVID??? Go the distance and provide water to your guests. I don’t want to travel through the hotel to find a vending machine for water. At the very least have 9t at the front desk for purchase when you check in!!!! EVERYBODY NEEDS WATER!!! Big BUMMMER! DEAL BREAKER!!

Excellent service .this was our first visit to Ayers suites .  We will totally come back again . Loved the view, food was really  , the hotel and common places  where very clean and the staff was amazing . It was totally with our money.

Summary Heading: Excellent, super clean, friendly, perfect stay.
Summary: The room is immaculate. Perfectly clean. The make my own waffles and eggs for breakfast tasty. Air in the room was clean, did not leave me feeling stuffy like some hotels. Location is very good. Staff is very friendly. Lobby is a comfortable place to relax.

1st time stay at Ayres Suites, would definitely stay again. Safe area,friendly knowledgeable staff, top notch maid service, thumbs up on the continental breakfast spread, great shopping opportunities all around the hotel.

Comfortable stay.  Large, clean, comfortable bed. Quiet. Good AC to keep the room cool. Decent breakfast compete with waffle maker station.  Staff were also very attentive and were always available at the front desk.  My husband and I needed a night away from the kids to get a good night's sleep and Ayres was able to do that for us.  Would stay again.

The hotel was clean and our room was very quiet and peaceful, even when the hotel was full. Customer service was top notch from the front desk all the way to the maintenance guys in the parking lot. Our AC was ice cold and water pressure was great. Plenty of places to eat and shop within walking distance or just a short drive. Highly recommend this place.

Very convenient and Fast Food close by. My room was very clean although is in much need of a remodel. The entire Hotel needs to be updated but it is also very clean. $189 per night is quite steep for the age of the decor.  I highly recommend an update.  All in all I felt safe and it was good for a one night stay.

We have stayed at The Ayres Suites when we're visiting Yorba Linda. We have always been happy with our rooms, the service and the pleasant staff. We also used the spa each night to ensure a good night's sleep.

A very nice place. Clean, welcoming and safe. The staff was pleasant and professional.  Parking can be right in a few spaces, so be aware but if you don't mind walking, there's more parking next door.   Very close to restaurants and shopping.   Overall a very nice place

Summary Heading: July 24th Wedding Celebration at Richard Nixon Library
Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. It was very clean! My room was clean, the bathroom was spotless. I was able to take a long bath without seeing any residue, mildew, etc. It was very nice. My bed was super comfortable, and cozy, I slept really well. The room is spacious and didn't feel cramped at all. I loved the refrigerator and microwave. That really came in handy. I bought snacks, and drinks and we were able to much on stuff in the middle of the night. What I didn't eat, I was able to refrigerate. I loved that.  Everything was quiet, although the hotel was packed the first night, you could tell, because it was quiet inside of my room.  The breakfast is a full breakfast with eggs, meat, and pancakes. They also offer other stull like yogurt, fruit and cereal. The first

Invited to a wedding  that was open bar so I  knew we needed a place to stay.  This was recommended.  Bed was so comfortable! Had the best sleep! Room is spacious, clean, quiet & has everything you need! Close to freeway which to me is a plus.

We stayed at the Yorba Linda location for a family wedding. The front desk staff were friendly and pleasant. Our rooms were larger than we expected, and very clean and neat. The beds were the best part they were so comfortable! I was instantly asleep every night. Breakfast was included and the staff were kind and accommodating. I would definitely recommend staying here again!

We stayed for 6 days and did not have one noisy night. It was so quiet and the room was very clean. If we needed something, the staff went above and beyond to take care of us. Breakfast was delicious too. We will definitely stay again.

We needed a last minute hotel stay for the 4th of July. Ayres had a room available at a decent price.  We had room 401, very clean and nice! Good Covid style breakfast as well included. Would recommend!

Hotel was nice, clean, and comfortable. The staff was friendly and professional.  Rates were reasonable. We stayed. Whole week and the hotel was booked but it was quite.  Next time I am in town I plan on staying there again.

Hotel was relatively clean and kept. Bed was comfortable and the hotel was not full so it was quiet. However, the A/C in my 1st room did not work and it struggled in the 2nd room. Also, the mini fridge didn't keep anything close to cold. I typically use the fridge for fresh foods so I am not stuck eating out every meal, so this was pretty annoying. I found some tools left in my closet under the hair dryer. If you are dependent on a decent breakfast, I would look elsewhere. Other than that, it was easy to access and close to everything I needed for my seminar.

Summary Heading: The good and the Really bad
Summary: Stayed in the horrible Motel 6 in Yorba Linda first and switched to the Ayers Suites Yorba Linda. Everything seemed great and it was with exception of a very poorly cleaned room. The dining table was completely dirty but from a general glacé seem cleaned... so basically in this time of COVID surfaces are not being generally sanitized. Also opened my window to find cigarette butts! Bar surface wiped but not cleaned.
Manager Response: Dear Julie,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and writing a review based on your experience! I would like to extend my sincere apology for any issues you may have encountered in regards to the cleanliness of the guest room throughout your stay. Our priority is to provide the most exceptional experiences for our valued guests and we are disappointed to see that we fell short this time around. We appreciate your feedback as we can use it as a means to better improve for the future. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a satisfactory stay.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: I fell in the shower and had a hard time getting out. Front desk asked us if we needed a ambulance just directions to the closest hospital, they did not know. After we returned from the hospital, no one called or checked up or asked if we are ok.  Ask the question, how do I think my stay went. I missed my granddaughter's graduation from school, due to a slick plastic tub floor.

This was the first time we stayed at an Ayers Hotel. I usually stay at one of the big chains. We were pleasantly surprised with everything about this hotel.  The lobby was clean and nicely decorated. The front desk staff and the house keeping staff were all very nice and professional in their duties. The room was very spacious. We never felt crowded in any way. Our room was on the south side of the building, closest to the freeway. However, we never really noticed the noise of the freeway. The free breakfast was great. It was a lot of the same thing you’d get at other places, but the quality was much higher. The staff cooked fresh batches of eggs, pancakes, biscuits, sausage and country potatoes so everything was hot and fresh. Another plus was the complimentary charging for our

This hotel was quiet and all the staff were friendly. Breakfast was a hot meal with eggs, pancakes and sausage. I will definitely stay here again. It is my new go to location when I come to Orange County.

After reading the reviews and seeing that this was close to  Highway 91 I was a little apprehensive, but after reading the overall reviews of the resort I thought I would give it a try. My girlfriend and I checked in but wanted to view the room first before unpacking our luggage, we did and ended up moving to the opposite side of the hotel so we could have the mountain views, so if you are planning a trip tell the front desk you want an even side room number, the odds say room numbers are facing Highway 91 freeway. Otherwise everything was above and beyond what was expected. Will certainly stay here again in the future, the staff was wonderful in every aspect of our stay very customer service oriented

This is in a great part of Yorba Linda with a lot of restaurants and shops near by.  The parking is a little cramped, but good enough.    Things I liked:  The Bathtub--it is huge! The water stays hot enough to fill the tub.  I was there for three days and took three baths.    The bed was comfortable and clean.  I love the white bedding.  It has a duvet with white sheets.    The room was quiet.  The air conditioning was great.  The free breakfasts are social distanced so you can take your food up to your room.  Check in was easy.  Things that were lacking:  The TOILET.  The water level of the toilet was terrible and this may be TMI, but I had to fill up the trash can with water to help flush the toilet so the cleaning staff wouldn't find a gross souvenir of my visit.  The

Summary Heading: The Only Hotel That Charges Before Stay
Summary: This hotel overall was good but I was extremely disappointed that they bill your credit card at the time of check in rather than when you check out like every other hotel that I've stayed at. This caused a lot of grief and stress and anxiety because my stay was a corporate stay where I need to expense my hotel stay but due to the credit card billing cycle and the charges at the beginning of the stay, I had to pay for the entire stay from my personal bank account. And I don't have a few thousand dollars available for these charges. In addition, the hotel charged an incidental fee of US$50 on the day of check in but because my corporate card was in Canadian dollars and the hotel billed my bank (rather than place a hold) and then two weeks later credited my card, that US$50 was a
Manager Response: Dear Ray,  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. We are happy to see that your stay was good overall, but I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you may have encountered in regards to our charge policy and fellow guests staying with us. We strive to provide exceptional experiences and are disappointed to see that we did not successfully do that for you this time around. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for an improved stay.   Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench  General Manager

Summary Heading: One night when we needed to relax
Summary: The peace of this hotel were exactly what we needed.  We were able to unwind and reconnect and just remember why it’s just heavenly to be taken care of once in a while.  Clean, lovely and quiet.  :) Exactly!!!

Despite covid-19, we still got a normal breakfast, what I don't get in any other hotel. The room was extremely clean, and the view on the mountains is really special. The service is also very good and everyone is very friendly. Parking is also perfect. It's worth staying at this hotel, I would recommend it to anyone.

I booked this stay just days before arrival. The room was for my son and I to visit and be silly for two days. Thank you for the friendly faces, the customer service provided. I would stay here again,  and probably will soon.

We stayed at The Ayres in Yorba Linda when we traveled to California for a funeral. It was perfect!  The staff was very friendly, the hotel and rooms were clean, and a hot breakfast was provided each morning (socially distanced).  It's close to Costco, restaurants and the freeway. We really enjoyed our stay and will return again next time we visit CA.

We needed a change of scenery but did not feel like driving very far, so we headed for the hills... This is a nice little local escape.  The rooms are very clean and the layout is large.  Free breakfast in the morning. There is an El Torito Mexican food restaurant next door which makes it easy to get take-out, and there are also a number of drive-thru's nearby, including McDonald's.  It was very quiet and nice to be able to enjoy the views of the foothills.  The bath tubs are large enough to fit two people; which is nice if you are like me and enjoy soaking your aching muscles in hot water.  The beds are comfortable and seem to be quite sturdy.  They also allow Dogs for an additional fee, however I think they give you a handicap equipped bathroom when bringing a dog.  Overall, a

Despite COVID restrictions, the Ayres family does a great job giving us great accommodations at a great price. Clean comfortable room. Excellent grab and go breakfast. Staff made our stay work helping to provide great comfort.

I have been here twice and as a traveling health care provider, I always look for safe clean places to stay. This is always my go-to spot in Yorba Linda. The best part is the microwave in the room!!!!

First time in years that we stayed at a property with zero issues. Staff was very attentive and helpful but when bot needed they weren’t seen. Housekeeping was great and worked around our schedule. Suites were clean and comfortable. Hot water was never ending and extremely hot as we like.

I went on vacation to SoCal for five days and happened upon Ayres Suites when my previous hotel announced they would be closed during my stay. The booking process was straight-forward and the Hostess that assisted me with the booking was very friendly and professional. Upon check-in, there was no complications and everything was pretty straight-forward. The lobby was clean and welcoming with appropriate signage and social distancing measurements in place.   The room was beautiful upon entering, basic 2 Queen bed room and decent bathroom and the housekeeping was top notch. We did get checked on once by housekeeping to see if we needed more towels and such which was nice.  On one of my various trips out of the hotel I did walk by and see some rooms in the process of being cleaned

Stayed at the Lovely Ayres Suites in Yorba Linda.  We love coming to Southern California and visiting friends and family.   Ayres is always an extremely comfortable place to stay.  They may you feel warm and welcome.  That is why we make sure to stay at this location whenever possible.  The Staff is amazing and attentive to all guests.

We were only there one night, but the room was wonderful. Very quite, clean room and relaxing.  We stayed in the YL area , very easy to get to our appointments and family. We were able to eat a wonderful l meal next door to El Torito . The staff were very friendly, and always helpful. Thanks again ...

It was my first stay at an Ayers hotel and I was blown away! The decor in the rooms is elegant and up to date. The room was clean top to bottom. The TV channel selection is excellent. Rooms are well insulated and quiet. Staff was very friendly.  It is the best value by far in the area. Already booked my next stay!

This hotel is always clean and nice. The parking lot needs to be cleaned more often and re-paved for sure! The actual hotel rooms and service is great. I visited CA for a week and stayed at the Ayres in Yorba linda 2 nights and the Ayres in Carlsbad/Vista 2 nights. Both, clean and friendly and a great place to R & R.

The Aryes is great! Always clean rooms and I love they offer a 20% discount coupon at El Torito for brunch. We stayed at the YL location. We have also stayed at the Coto De Caza location and that was amazing as well.

What a mice stay , we had side by side rooms as family also hooked a room, clean reopen , great customer service, pool was refreshing during the hot temperatures outside, and if you don’t like the sun you can relax in the comfy bed in air conditioning our family  would stay again

Lady working front desk went above and beyond to make our stay the most welcomed and the most comfortable. She was incredibly  sweet. And extremely helpful with all our needs, wants, and  concerns. I wish I could remember her name.

The staff was very nice and professional. Room was very spacious and nice. Everything was very clean and sanitized. Bed was comfortable. Breakfast was Delicious!  We will stay here again!!!! Thank you Ayres Hotel for a Great stay!!

We love staying at the Ayres in Yorba Linda, CA!  The rooms are always very clean, the staff friendly, the rooms quiet, and the FREE hot breakfast is amazing!  The water for both the bathroom sink and shower is hot immediately.  We stay here whenever we are in town which is a few times a year and we always have the same excellent quality of rooms and service.  We LOVE the Ayres!!

Nice property and professional, friendly staff.  Breakfasts were excellent, the lady who runs the buffet keeps the food hot and fresh.  Our room was comfortable, the bed/linens were nice.  Would definitely stay there again.

Our stay at Ayres Suites Yorba Linda was delightful.  The desk help was  helpful, courteous, friendly and efficient at check-in.   I know the rooms were recently refurbished, and ours was wonderful.  Quiet, comfy bed, good climate control,  great shower (and all important, BIG FLUFFY TOWELS!),  WIFI  was sufficiently powerful.  In the morning, the hot breakfast was everything I could want.  Can't think of a negative.  I love the place!

This is a great place to stay. Clean comfortable room, good fresh breakfast and courteous helpful staff. The Ayre’s family prides itself in providing a boutique hotel atmosphere. This property does not disappoint. Five stars.

We had originally booked a room at Extended Stay, but when we went to check in they turned us away saying they were overbooked. Disheartened, frustrated and tired after driving for 4 hours we were directed to Ayers Suites and they were so friendly and helpful and able to book us a room for the weekend. We really lucked out! Not just with having an available room, but it was so much better than we anticipated. Free parking. Lovely room. Huge TV. Microwave. Refrigerator. And a free breakfast brunch with pancakes, eggs, sausage, fruit, bagels, cereal, waffle station, etc. Plus it's right off the 91 with easy freeway access, Costco right down the street. There's plenty of food options nearby - Denny's, El Torito, Mickey D's, ChickfilA. We will definitely be booking here again when

Summary Heading: One Night Stay on Holiday Weekend
Summary: We had a corner king studio suite. It was a good size room for my family of four with a pull-out sofa. The sofa bed was already prepared and ready for us when we arrived late Saturday night of a three-day holiday weekend. The staff were friendly. Breakfast was delicious--fruit salad, cottage cheese, hard-boiled eggs, scrambled eggs, country potatoes, french toast, sausage, danishes, muffins, bagels, bread for toast, and my sons' favorite, make your own belgian waffle with either strawberry or apple fruit compote. I had one issue when booking online. I had "unlocked" a "private sale" price but when entered my credit card and clicked submit, the price changed! I had to call the hotel. The person I spoke with said she could not do anything to get that price back for me. I had to

Overall great experience with the staff. Very close to all stores and events. Thankful for having the opportunity to stay there. Very clean and safe environment for business or family trips. I would absolutely stay again in the future.

Ayers Suites Hotel in Yorba Linda is an up-scale hotel and highly recommended.  The public areas are finished with fine materials and have a luxury feel.  The rooms are spacious and furnished with nice furniture.  The breakfast room is attractive and offers a good variety of foods for a hot breakfast, and is served on china plates with metal silverware.  The only item which does not appear to be first class is the heating/cooling units in the rooms, which have old fashioned controls instead of a wall thermostat, and can run noisy and not cool as well as they should.  The hotel can be a bit tricky to get to, the Google map I had did not exactly match the street names.

Stayed there for one night on the way to a cruise out of Long Beach.  Very nice hotel, room was big, and breakfast was great.  I used the gym, which was ok.  I would stay here again.  Booked through a discount website, and had a great deal.

The room was clean, bed was soft, and bath tub is big enough for two. Breakfast was great it had eggs and potatoes as well as all cold items. They have a bar and billiard table. The Mexican restaurant next door is very good and if you sit in the bar they have happy hour all day. I would recommend this hotel.

Every single aspect of the Ayres, Yorba Linda, stay went excellently.  The staff, the facility, the room, the linens,.. everything was perfect.  We had recently visited perhaps the worst Hilton property in the world in Huntington Beach last month.  The Ayres stay was all it was supposed to be versus the Hilton which was a bust and a rip off.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and friendly staff
Summary: This is my 2nd time staying at the Ayres Suites Yorba Linda. The staff is very friendly and accommodating whether I have to check out early (night before) or late checkout for flights. The room is clean and quiet. There are coin-operated washing and drying machines onsite if you want to save money on laundry.

Summary Heading: Great place.  I will keep coming back here.
Summary: Love this place.  I stay here a few times a year while visiting on business in Anaheim, and I have never had a bad experience.  Great staff, clean rooms, comfortable beds, and a nice warm breakfast.  It's also located just a few minutes drive away from some great restaurants in the area.

Hard to write something different than what others have said about this hotel.  In short it's a great option to stay at this hotel if you are in the area.  Staff is excellent. Breakfast great. Rooms very clean and comfortable.  Location is neat several restaurants.

We really enjoyed our stay at the Ayers on Yorba Linda.  The staff was very friendly and helpful, the building was new, and the rooms were clean.  The breakfast was even good, which for a hotel is unusual.

My wife and I stayed 3 days at Ayers Hotel in Yorba Linda in November 2019. Ms. Stephanie Rench, the hotel’s General Manager, was kind enough to accommodate our special request. The hotel’s staff was very helpful and professional in rendering excellent service during our stay. We intend to be back in the near future. We strongly recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels I have stayed
Summary: Since we arrived until we left everything was amazing. Cleans rooms and the were spacious. The continental breakfast was delicious, have a lot of options. Is one of the best hotels I have stayed in and  I would recommend it to my friends and family.

We really liked our stay! We even booked a extra night. Beds were really comfortable and there was enough space in the room for the three of us. Nice swimming pool (unfortunately shadow the whole day). Breakfast was good. We would like to come back some day.

I stayed four days in September and found the property and staff to be excellent.  I called ahead to ask if I could check in early and was welcomed without a problem.  My room was ready, clean and comfortable!  Everyone was friendly and professional.  The warm cookies in the evening was a nice touch.  I will be back and I tell others that they will be happy staying here as well!

Reception, kind & hospitalble - Shuttle service (I was there for work) dependable - breakfast, cottage cheese had gone bad and I didn't notice until I ate a mouthful, also, same exact breakfast every single day - changing it up would be nice. Also, I left yoga pants and a white t-shirt behind. Called and I was told that nothing was turned in. Really?? Another girlfriend had her fancy headband mysteriously disappear after room service and the other, a $300 watch!! No excuse for this bs. I looked at other reviews and "missing personal items" was noted. I kept the "do not disturb" on my door every day. If my company didn't put me up there, I would not go back.
Manager Response: Dear Jean M.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay with us. While I am pleased to see that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle and found our team was kind and helpful, I would like to apologize regarding any issues you encountered during your stay with us, including some of the items at breakfast. I will absolutely be speaking to our breakfast and housekeeping teams regarding this review and I kindly encourage you to reach out to me personally to further discuss your experience, if you so wish. I can assure you that we will do our best to remedy the situation. You may reach me via phone at 714-921-8688. Thank you again for your kind review.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: We were displaced from our home due to a plumbing issue.  The Ayres was a great place to stay.  My 10 year old daughter loved getting up to go to school since she had a great complimentary breakfast to look forward to every morning.  Very clean accommodations and pleasant staff.

Had never stayed here before came for a family function staff was great upon check in breakfast next morning was great!  Room was clean and comfortable. Did not use the pool or fitness area. Everything was clean and comfortable. There is shopping and food close by.

Summary Heading: Consistently Great Service & Stay at Ayres Suites Yorba Linda
Summary: We stay in this area every summer for a convention, generally at one of the local Ayres who contracts with our group. This was our second time at Ayres Suites Yorba Linda, and this stay was just as nice as our first back in ‘16. They host a lot of groups, but the service is great; with clean, comfy & spacious rooms. Complementary hot breakfast buffet, evening reception, multi-use breakfast room (table-tennis or pool, anyone?) and warm evenings enjoying the pool/hot-tub round out the value. Thanks for another great stay!

Perfect overnight stay, rooms are very clean, service was wonderful and the breakfast was delicious with many options. There’s also an el Torito next door for late dinner or dessert. Highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Dear alnholmes27,  I appreciate you taking the time out of your day to write a review about our hotel. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us including our plentiful full American breakfast, convenient location and top-notch service. I hope we have the pleasure of serving you again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary Heading: A Gem of a Property in Yorba Linda
Summary: The room was clean and comfortable. Check-in and out were a breeze, and the breakfast offered a good, basic selection that covered what you would expect it to: eggs, bacon, sausage, toast...etc. No surprises, and it was plentiful and fresh. The kitchen staff did an excellent job of assuring that the selection was good and plentiful! My room was on the fourth floor, facing the highway but the hotel is set back far enough that noise is not an issue, and I suspect would only be for the lightest of sleepers. There are many restaurants in the area and plenty of shopping available, if desired. You can even go next door and buy a Maserati! (I did not).  If you're going to be in the area and need a good place to stay that is also a good value, give the Ayres Suties, Yorba Linda a call.

I only stayed for one evening, but I was sorry I didn’t stay one more day. The experience from beginning to end was fantastic. Plenty of parking, good location near the freeway, and plenty of restaurants nearby. I entered into a clean lobby and greeted immediately by warm, friendly staff. The hotel was clean and my room as well. I was able to get a good night’s rest and I helped myself to the morning breakfast. Thank you for a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Dear Sofia M.,  Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience with us! It is delightful to see that you had a wonderful experience at our hotel and that you enjoyed the attentive service our team strives to offer. Your kind words regarding our complimentary full American breakfast and our outstanding service are greatly appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: Easy check in and the staff was very friendly.  The hotel was a lot nicer then the photographs let on. I was worried about the quality of the rooms based on photographs but it’s a lot nicer than the photographs displayed. Bathrooms are newly renovated and nice. Hotel is clean Not too far from food spots.
Manager Response: Dear 720olayinkaa,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay. I am delighted to know that you enjoyed our convenient location, friendly and efficient service, as well as our updated rooms. We hope to welcome you back for another exceptional stay soon!  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: We were attending a wedding nearby and stayed at this Ayres Hitel.  The rooms were recently renovated and were immaculate, spacious and nicely decorated.  We enjoyed having a refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker in the room.  Breakfast was very good and included in the orice.  Overall a great stay.

Called hotel spoke with Ellenore. She was very polite and set up our reservation. Hotel is clean and comfortable. Breakfast is very good, suggest they have bacon or turkey sausage a couple times a week.  I would recommend this hotel if staying in Yorba Linda area.
Manager Response: Dear McCaffrey,  Thank you for your kind review and for choosing to stay at Ayres Suites Yorba Linda. I am thrilled that you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations, complimentary full American breakfast, as well as the attentive service our team provided. Thank you so much for your feedback, we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: We love this hotel.  Will stay here whenever in Orange County.  Good breakfast.  Good room size.  Convenient location.  Close to highway for easy access but far enough away that I never noticed any highway noise.
Manager Response: Dear likes_to_travel1200,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review. We are thrilled to know that you appreciated our convenient location, accommodations, and delicious full American breakfast. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: I loooove this hotel, the staff is very welcoming, they are always smiling, even when my anxiety kicks in they are understandable. Cheyenne, Aurora, Romy are very friendly every time I come in they always accommodate me. My husband plays at the east Anaheim gym so we always book here. The rooms are nice and clean. Not once have i had a problem with this hotel ive stayed here about 6 times and twice this past june. I also stayed this past weekend and had a pleasure to meet Ms Elizabeth who also was very nice and pleasant. And made sure i was happy with the room i got on sunday, Which i was. Thank you ayres suites in yorba linda.
Manager Response: Dear Cindym290822,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us! It is a delight to know that you had the opportunity to enjoy our exclusive hotel amenities and comfortable accommodations. Your compliments regarding our hotel and team members Aurora, Cheyenne, Romy, and Elizabeth are very kind and we thank you. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: I truly like this place. From the minute I got in until the night before I leave I loved everything about the room we stayed at while in California. The young lady who took care of us (Aurora) was awesome. Unfortunately because of my mistake I had to add on a few more days to my stay and there was a possibility of having to pack up and move rooms but she addressed the situation expertly and made sure we were not inconvenienced.  The hotel served complimentary breakfast and I must say that it was perfect every day. Usually scrambled eggs, potatoes, French toast or pancakes. Along with various pastries, waffles and cereal. Every morning we got off to a great start with breakfast. In addition to breakfast there was also a nice pool which was a perfect way to unwind after a long no
Manager Response: Dear Andres72423,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are thrilled to see that we were able to exceed your expectations by offering you a warm and welcoming stay including our delicious breakfast, well-appointed accommodations, and our helpful team member Aurora. I am delighted to know that she was able to help you in regards to changing your check out dates successfully. We look forward to having you back very soon for another exceptional stay.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: Just returned from a 3 night stay. Had business in Central Orange County. Very familiar with areas and hotels but discovered that summertime anywhere within Disneyland area brings astronomical rates. Ayres Yorba Linda was only 20 miles from our meetings and close to 91, 55 and 57 freeways so even weekday commutes were manageable. Would highly recommend for families heading to Disney parks as well. When free parking, WiFi, and breakfasts are factored in, we easily saved $100 per night on comparable hotels in Anaheim and surrounding cities. Hotel stay itself was awesome. Beautiful place. Spacious and comfortable room, spotless, good breakfasts, and friendly, helpful staff.
Manager Response: Dear Californiaslolife,  Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay at Ayres Suites Yorba Linda. Your compliments regarding our prime location, premium amenities, and comfortable accommodations are greatly appreciated. Thank you for your wonderful feedback, we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Ayres Yorba Linda location. The accommodations were clean, comfortable and spacious. We appreciated the convenient location right near Sprouts and Costco. A very big plus! The breakfast was good. They altered the options between pancakes and French toast every morning, that was nice. It would be awesome if they decided to do that also for the meat options as well. Maybe in the future. Staff was helpful and friendly. We had a small problem with our mini fridge during our stay but Miguel from maintenance helped us switch it out for a new one. He was prompt about it and the issue was resolved. It was just what we needed for the time we were there. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear A and C P,  We truly appreciate your star rating and for taking the time to share your experience with us. It is quite satisfying to see that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable experience and we look forward to your return for another exceptional stay.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: A shout out to the front desk assistant Aurora! She was so sweet and accommodating! Helped us with all and any request. Great rooms, room service, a nice pool, and great hot tub/spa.  The only reason I am giving a 4 is because I had such an unsavory experience with on of the workers. I believe his name is Salvatore. He was supposed to be providing shuttle service for our family. First it was hard for the girl at the front desk (not Aurora) to track him down. She was great but just waiting for him to answer took forever. Then he walks past and you can tell he is completely ignore her. She calls him one more time and he is rude to her like “what do you want?”. She asks kindly “Can shuttle to the house for the wedding party?” And he answers with “I don’t know what you’re talking
Manager Response: Dear Muchyummi3r,  Thank you for your candid review and sincere feedback. While I appreciate your kind complimnets regarding our accommodations, pool, and our wonderful and helpful team member Aurora, please accept my sincere apologies regarding any issues you had with utilizing the shuttle. I can assure you that your review has acted as a training platform to ensure we are offering only the highest level of service to our valued guests. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: Upon arrival, the check in process was very quick and easy.  I was surprised at how spacious the rooms were.  Additionally, they were very clean and had a nice clean smell.  One of my favorite parts of the hotel is the lobby.  It was very cozy and relaxing.  It was definitely a nice place to relax and I highly recommend using this hotel for any type of stay.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy S.,  Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay at Ayres Suites Yorba Linda. Your compliments regarding the quick and easy check-in process, our clean accommodations, and our cozy living room area are greatly appreciated. Thank you for your feedback, we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary Heading: Overnight stay for a high school graduation
Summary: The young lady booking the reservation was very professional and friendly. Upon arrival we were greeted with a big smile and welcome by Cheyenne  She was also professional and explained the breakfast, internet access and room location to us before we asked.  All the employees that we came in contact with said hello and were well trained for customer service.  Breakfast was above the average and it was tasty with good variety and good hot coffee.  We would definitely stay at Ayres Suites again based on our experience at Yorba Linda.
Manager Response: Dear Zane L.,  We sincerely appreciate your detailed review! Our team is devoted to exceeding your expectations and we are thrilled to see that we did just that during your stay. Your compliments regarding our team member Cheyenne, our full buffet breakfast, optimal location, and the accommodations we offer are truly appreciated. Thank you for your review and we hope to welcome you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: Such a nice hotel, rooms are elegant and comfortable. Front desk people are so helpful and nice. Breakfast is espectacular, hot breakfast every day, not the classic continental breakfast from other hotels. Right off the freeway and ease access to it. A lot of restaurants around the hotel, some of them are walking distance from the hotel. My stay at this hotel was so pleasant, definitely I’ll stay here next time I visit California.

Both my husband and I were very happy with our stay at the Ayers Suites! The rooms were large and clean. The towels were large and well made. The free breakfast was an added bonus! But the price was awesome and no “resort fees!” I would definitely recommend this hotel! It’s also conveniently located off the 91 Freeway and shopping close by with an El Torrito right next door!

My niece got a group discount for her guests to stay after her beautiful wedding nearby golf course. Upon arrival to the hotel we were greeted like rock stars! The room and amenities exceeded all of our expectations! Beautiful facility and fantastic room! It’s been a long time that I’ve not been happy with a hotel room. Thank you for the great service! The price is not expensive either! 😉

Clean, well decorated room. Crisp sheets. Delicious breakfast with real scrambled eggs, not Hotel eggs. Desk staff was very helpful and friendly. Everything worked as it should, and it was a real pleasure to stay here. I would definitely choose this hotel again.

One downside to the hotel is that it is right next to the 91 freeway. So one tip I would suggest would be to make sure you have a room at the back of the hotel.   The service was good and one bonus was that we were able to charge our EV at one of the free charging stations. Having said that, the hotel staff should make sure that they don’t allow non electric cars to park in those spaces.

Summary Heading: Very pleasant experience - definitely a place I will stay again

I was pleasantly surprised at how clean, and nice the rooms were, the whole place was very quiet and no loud obnoxious guests keeping me awake.  The staff are friendly and super helpful.  I had a very odd request and they came through - I needed a 4-5 foot lightweight pole to do my physical therapy exercises and I couldn't believe they found one.  The warm breakfast was delicious with lots of choices.  I still can't believe I had never heard of you before - but don't worry, I won't keep you a secret.   Michele

I did not had a chance to try the breakfast but it look very nice. Enough space for everyone to sit.  Well located near highways, stores and restaurant not too far.  My only problem was with the noise outside because of the wind. My ear pluggs were welcomed.

Everything was quite nice.  The only negative thing was the refrigerator kept us awake all night - going off and on.  this has happened before - may have to chose another hotel.   My husband is handicapped and really needs his rest, so may have to make a change the next time.   Breakfast facilities were great.

The Staff is thoroughly World Class, highly competent and extremely courteous. The Lobby has a nice ambiance.  The Breakfast bar is not as fancy as the Marriott, but you are not paying $14.95 for it either; it is complementary, there is a wide selection with friendly staff, and the food is good.  My room was tastefully decorated, generously sized with a very comfortable bed, a 55" TV, refrigerator (no freezer) ad microwave.  The bathtub is very large, hot water was immediate and plentiful.  To sum up, a very nice hotel at a good (The corporate rate was a steal) price

The staff is always nice and helpful.  The breakfast is great.  Not your average free breakfast.  It is very good.  Overall we keep coming back because we have come to expect a smooth, and happy stay.

Summary: Breakfast was excellent.  Meeting room was comfortable for a SMALL group, but a tad distracted by noise from next door.  Pool could have been cleaner.  Loved the size of the showers in the guest rooms, but was disappointed that a King bed for a couple was not available.

We held our fellowship hour by the pool and held our staff retreat in their meeting room.  The staff was extremely accommodating in allowing us to access the meeting room to set up and offered a great breakfast and lovely meeting space which can be set up in a number of ways (u-shape/classroom/theater). Large bathroom with tub/shower.  Firm beds. Great lighting. Good freeway accessibility.  Close to familiar restaurants and fast food. Near Costco & Staples for business/personal needs.  We will return for our Ministers Retreat in late Sept.  We recommend this venue!

It was convenient to the church and reception - just minutes from the Nixon Library Museum too. Good breakfast is included with lots of choices. Room was comfortable. Our a/c worked well and also acted as white noise to help us sleep. Staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Laurie P.,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay at Ayres Suites Yorba Linda. I am thrilled to know that your experience at our hotel was quite enjoyable and hope that you will return again anytime you find yourselves in Yorba Linda.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: Everything was great until I went down for breakfast.  They have Fox News on the television.  They need to stick to something more generic like local news, CNN, or non-news type channel.  Fox News it too partisan and offensive to many.
Manager Response: Dear Teri H.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay with us. While I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your time at our hotel, I would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during breakfast. We certainly appreciate your insight and hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: The bed slept very comfortably. It was quiet on the 4th floor. Staff was friendly and professional. We did not eat the breakfast but appeared good. Room was clean. I have stayed here before and will return.Parking was convenient.

Good staff, clean room, great price.  Last minute stop in with no reservation and I was accommodated without any issues.  Clean rooms, decent hot breakfast, friendly staff.  The facility was clean and welcoming.

This is the third time staying a Ayres Yorba Linda, always friendly employees, our room is always ready and clean. Hotel is close to freeway access, lots of shopping and restaurans. Rooms are very spacious. We were there June 2018.

We stayed for one nite while in town for a family event.  We found the hotel to be very clean and nicely appointed.  Our room was spacious and had both a refrigerator and microwave.  The breakfast area is roomy, nicely set up and doesn’t feel like an after thought as is the case in so many hotels these days.  The food was plentiful and with both hot and cold choices.  It is close to the freeway and a shopping center.  Fast food restaurants are close and there is a full service restaurant adjacent to the property.
Manager Response: Dear HBdonna,  Thank you for your kind review and rating. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed your time with us and hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: We stayed at Ayres Yorba Linda in February 2018 for the first time and found it clean and comfortable but, dated. Our return visit at the end of May 2018 was a surprise. All rooms and some common areas have been updated. The style is not trendy but designed to be stylish for a length of time. Well lit, wide halls. Rooms are large. Good breakfast with fresh cooked eggs, not powdered. It is a little difficult to find and is directly next to an expressway. Restaurants and fast food chains are close by. Traffic noise did not affect us, but even if you are sensitive to it, you may want to try it anyway. Very comfortable beds and super pillows may put you into a deep sleep voiding any traffic noise.
Manager Response: Dear Southsider,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Suites Yorba Linda and for your wonderful review following your stay and our recent renovations. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed your time with us and hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary Heading: Good Location for onward journeys to the east of LA
Summary: We really enjoyed the Ayres Suite the room was immaculate on arrival and stayed that way for our 3 night stay. The room was spacious and well kitted out and fabulous value for money, from the moment we got there the staff were helpful and very friendly. The hotel is located just off the I91, and is a busy journey from LAX which ever route you chose. But being on the 91 makes it easy for onward journeys to the east, ie Kingman, Williams, Route 66 and Grand Canyon. If you need a night or two to get over the journey then the Ayres Suite is well worth a visit.
Manager Response: Dear Awbvmb,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Suites Yorba Linda. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel with wonderful, courteous staff. Stayed 3 nights and had a great time.  Rooms are very spacious and felt like home. Close to lots of restaurants and stores. Definitely would stay at Ayres properties again.

Summary Heading: Good stay, but was put in a disabled room
Summary: Overall good experience, people are very friendly and helpful! Only I was put in a disabled room. Room was clean, but other experience because of that. Also missed some personal items during staff cleaning. Reception persons were helpful to figure out, but without any luck
Manager Response: Dear jolmey01,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay with us. I would like to extend our most sincere apologies for any inconsistencies you encountered during your visit. Thank you for your review and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: One of my favorite experiences while traveling is to discover a surprisingly wonderful hotel. The Ayers Suites was definitely one of those. It has a warm, inviting atmosphere, an extremely well trained and attentive staff, an above average breakfast offering, and very spacious, clean rooms. I will be seeking out other Ayers properties in my future travels.
Manager Response: Dear Bmwrider1,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Suites Yorba Linda. I am delighted to see that you enjoyed your time with us and hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Stephanie Rench General Manager

Summary: The property is conveniently located with easy access to restaurants, shops and services. Rooms are spacious and impeccably clean and maintained. Staff is most welcoming and helpful. This was our first stay at an Ayres hotel and we will be back. As a retired luxury hotel GM, I am not easy to impress. But Ayres Suites did just that. Recommended.

This is the 4th time I stayed at this particular hotel and I am very glad I check in very late so I dont have to deal with employees very much. the lack of service oriented people is very noticeable.
